categories: Category:Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2012 articles

nodes.text: "The Perils of Padmé" is an interview with Catherine Taber about her work as the voice of Senator Padmé Amidala for the TV series Star Wars: The Clone Wars. The article was written by James Burns and appeared in Star Wars Insider 116. It was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2012.
